message: But you've gotta love his quote that he has a great relationship with blacks when he can't even manage to be civil with the other presidential candidates, Faux News personalities, comediannes, etc. while coming up with elaborate excuses why he was right to launch into a tirade, get into a twitter war, or even defend marital rape. Somehow I suspect that his great relation with anyone is that he demands they do something and they obey (when I say jump, the only question you can ask is How High ?). Of course, from the slaveowners of the old south to a pamphlet I saw at a SC BBQ joint they all claimed a great relationship with the slaves (while simultaneously living in fear that the slaves might revolt).

Landon Sharp smart move .. ignore what Bernie has requested his supporters do to further Our Revolution and aid a Trump win that would set back progressives for decades to come. It's about long term strategy now.
